title: The Last Good Night
description: The Last Good An Original Sinners novella told in five parts.Part The Last Good NightNow that the perpetrator has been apprehended, Nora sadly acknowledges she doesn't need a bodyguard anymore. She adores Lance and wants to keep him but is faced with a dilemma--if she uses her connections to help Lance, she'll have to give him up forever...
author: Tiffany Reisz
